oai_dc:dc.dc:title: An example of a method to wirelessly transfer measurement data from cows in a free stall barn
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Järvinen, M.
Sutinen, V.
Martiskainen, P.
Rehu, J.
Korkalainen, M.
Känsälä, K.
Mononen, J.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Animal husbandry
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Here we describe a wireless data measurement and transfer system that operates within a free stall barn. We report also the reliability of the system. This system was designed and built in Very Intelligent Cow Barn project in 2006-2007.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Järvinen, M.; Sutinen, V.; Martiskainen, P.; Rehu, J.; Korkalainen, M.; Känsälä, K. and Mononen, J. (2010) An example of a method to wirelessly transfer measurement data from cows in a free stall barn. In: Proceedings of the 22nd Nordic symposium of the International Society for Applied Ethology, Finnish Society for Applied Ethology, p. 16.
